languages.text:
{n}С усталым вздохом Арлекин подытоживает:{/n}
"Когда утихнет коды звук навек,
Исполнит первый долг,
Второй свершит побег".

{n}With a weary sigh, the Harlequin concludes,{/n}
"When coda's note falls silent ever more,
The last a duty will perform, and then,
The first will move, {mf|his|her} exodus enact."
languages.original_text:
{n}С усталым вздохом Арлекин подытоживает:{/n}
"Когда утихнет коды звук навек,
Исполнит первый долг,
Второй свершит побег".

"When coda's note falls silent ever more,
The last a duty will perform, and then,
The first will move, {mf|his|her} exodus enact."
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

traits.locale_text:
{n}With a weary sigh, the Harlequin concludes,{/n}
"When coda's note falls silent ever more,
The last a duty will perform, and then,
The first will move, {mf|his|her} exodus enact."
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
{n}伴随着一声疲惫的叹息，丑角最终开了口。{/n}
“尾声的音符越发沉寂，
最后的演出即将就绪。
随后，最初之物将会离去，
{mf|他|她}将会逃出此地。”
languages.original_text:
{n}With a weary sigh, the Harlequin concludes,{/n}
"When coda's note falls silent ever more,
The last a duty will perform, and then,
The first will move, {mf|his|her} exodus enact."

traits.locale_text:
{n}伴随着一声疲惫的叹息，丑角最终开了口。{/n}
“尾声的音符越发沉寂，
最后的演出即将就绪。
随后，最初之物将会离去，
{mf|他|她}将会逃出此地。”
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
{n}Con un suspiro de cansancio, el Arlequín concluye:{/n}
«Cuando la nota de la coda calle por siempre,
el último cumplirá con su deber y, entonces,
{mf|el|la} primer{mf|o|a} actuará para de aquí desaparecer».
languages.original_text:
{n}With a weary sigh, the Harlequin concludes,{/n}
"When coda's note falls silent ever more,
The last a duty will perform, and then,
The first will move, {mf|his|her} exodus enact."

traits.locale_text:
{n}Con un suspiro de cansancio, el Arlequín concluye:{/n}
«Cuando la nota de la coda calle por siempre,
el último cumplirá con su deber y, entonces,
{mf|el|la} primer{mf|o|a} actuará para de aquí desaparecer».
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
{n}もの憂い気なため息をついて、ハーレクィンは締めた。{/n}
「フィナーレがさらに静まる時
最後に義務が実行され
最初の者が動き、{mf|彼|彼女}の脱出が成立する」
languages.original_text:
{n}With a weary sigh, the Harlequin concludes,{/n}
"When coda's note falls silent ever more,
The last a duty will perform, and then,
The first will move, {mf|his|her} exodus enact."

traits.locale_text:
{n}もの憂い気なため息をついて、ハーレクィンは締めた。{/n}
「フィナーレがさらに静まる時
最後に義務が実行され
最初の者が動き、{mf|彼|彼女}の脱出が成立する」
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
{n}Mit einem müden Seufzen schließt der Harlekin:{/n}
"Wenn verstummen die Noten der Coda,
Letzterer vollführt eine Pflicht, und dann
geht {mf|Ersterer|Erstere} zum Exodus über."
languages.original_text:
{n}With a weary sigh, the Harlequin concludes,{/n}
"When coda's note falls silent ever more,
The last a duty will perform, and then,
The first will move, {mf|his|her} exodus enact."

traits.locale_text:
{n}Mit einem müden Seufzen schließt der Harlekin:{/n}
"Wenn verstummen die Noten der Coda,
Letzterer vollführt eine Pflicht, und dann
geht {mf|Ersterer|Erstere} zum Exodus über."
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
{n}Dans un soupir las, l'Arlequin conclut :{/n}
« Lorsque les notes ultimes de la coda retentiront,
Ce dernier aura enfin accompli sa mission
Et {mf|le premier|la première} partira avec ses compagnons. »
languages.original_text:
{n}With a weary sigh, the Harlequin concludes,{/n}
"When coda's note falls silent ever more,
The last a duty will perform, and then,
The first will move, {mf|his|her} exodus enact."

traits.locale_text:
{n}Dans un soupir las, l'arlequin conclut :{/n}
« Lorsque les notes ultimes de la coda retentiront,
Ce dernier aura enfin accompli sa mission
Et {mf|le premier|la première} partira avec ses compagnons. »
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
{n}Bitkince iç çeken Arleken, lafının sonuna getiriyor.{/n}
"Gelmek üzereyse perdelere kapanış,
İkinci yapar görevini ve bekler alkış,
İlkinin işiyse sahneden iniş ve kaçış."
languages.original_text:
{n}With a weary sigh, the Harlequin concludes,{/n}
"When coda's note falls silent ever more,
The last a duty will perform, and then,
The first will move, {mf|his|her} exodus enact."

traits.locale_text:
{n}Bitkince iç çeken Arleken lafının sonuna geliyor.{/n}
"Gelmek üzereyse perdelere kapanış,
İkinci yapar görevini ve bekler alkış,
İlkinin işiyse sahneden iniş ve kaçış."
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle
